about_the_game:
Game bundle with 10 puzzle / logical games.
Something for those who like pipes, mazes, tiles, math games, falling blocks, match3, dungeons, pixels and challenges. In total 80 hand made levels, and unlimited number of randomly generated (depending on game you can choose map size and difficulty), shared screen option in 2 games. Ambient games, without tons of distractions and annoying popups. Puzzle themed music and basic sound effects.
Designed for both desktop and tablet devices, optimized so it will work well on low end devices such as laptops with old integrated GPU.
Support gamepads / controllers, keyboard, mouse and touch input.


Short descriptions of included games:

Twisted Line

Turn all dark tiles into light tiles by drawing a single line, that's it! Pick up keys to unlock blocked tiles, use special blocks to pass harder levels. Game includes 3 game modes and 12 hand made levels.

Pixel Village

Simple game in which You will build a lot of walls and roads. In total 3 game modes - protect village or play around with unruly colored walls.

Dungeon Slider

Mages are stuck in dark dungeon, help them escape from it, but remember to grab all magic potions. Ah and look out for interactive obstacles.

Simple Maze

Rectangular mazes generated with dozen of algorithms and playable in several game modes.

Plus or minus

Fast logic game, based on the original concept, slightly related to mathematics, more focused on planning and strategic approach. 6 game modes (Skirmish, Negation, Stars, Stars+, Hastag, Bombs), in 'Skirmish' mode you can play with up to 4 players and AI with 3 difficulty levels.

BR Pipes

Build your own drains. Place pipes on map to allow transport water from start point to end. Play on small and large maps, in 4 game modes + crazy color variation, try to beat all 40 levels.

Colored Tiles

Simple and fast strategic game. Your goal is to conquer the map by taking over colored tiles. To take any tile your colors must be the same, and that tile need to be adjacent to your other tiles. In 'Skirmish' mode you can play with up to 4 players and AI with 3 difficulty levels.

Colorful Ribbons

Cover all tiles with properly colored ribbons. Various ribbons can interweave, each of them marks tiles of same color as covered. Game includes 18 hand made levels.

Tetriles

Best classic if you have some spare time, comes with classic and puzzle mode in two variants. Simple graphic with 3 art styles for blocks and responsive controls.

Match 3

3 variations of this simple concept, includes single player and competitive game modes (AI, shared screen).

legal_notice:
Includes
modified sprites made by pita.itch.io and 7soul.itch.io
modified icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
music from www.soundimage.org
name: BR Logic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Game bundle with 10 logical / puzzle games. Something for those who like pipes, mazes, tiles, math games, falling blocks, match3, dungeons, pixels and challenges. Ambient games, without tons of distractions. Focused on random levels.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
